prompt_base: menacing alien overlord, gleaming white bio-armor, crystalline purple gems, piercing red eyes, visible tail, intimidating expression, 8k photorealistic rendering
feature_prompt: polished surface texture, high-gloss reflections, sharp focus on gems, smooth organic texture on body, detailed segments, volumetric rim lighting
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, dull surface, matte skin, fleshy texture, human proportions, bulky, low quality, deformed, furry, soft body
